remarks: A group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` H ` is also a group homomorphism from ` G ` to its image in ` H ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.)
statement:
ghomgsg.1 $e |- Y = ran F $.
ghomgsg.2 $e |- S = ( H |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
ghomgsg $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> F e. ( G GrpOpHom S ) ) $.
